subject: Re: Duracube Website – Amendments for new brand launch 29th June 2023
preview: @heath ok to go live on the staging site.

full_threads.body: @heath ok to go live on the staging site.

Hi Ben,

Please see the email from Chris below and let me know a suitable time for a meeting.

Kind regards,
Belinda Henderson
Marketing Specialist
Tel: 1300 387 228
Address: 13 Pullman Place, Emu Plains NSW 2750

Hi Belinda, 

We have completed all but one of the changes - footer font styling, we can review during our call. 

Let's catch up to go through the go-live sequence. Please note, we anticipate going live after 4-5 pm. 

Given the time-sensitive nature, can I please ask that Ben attends this meeting? 

Here is my calendar link https://calendly.com/chris-paradowski/wolf-iq-checkin

Hi @chris updates completed
Latest updates is on the bottom part with heading of - June 30, 2023
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1lmm5q108_p22BjboxLLITX2bsJUTaoJKsJosnodI9VE/edit?usp=sharing

Note: I am unable to update the font weight as the Helvetica-Light font has limited options in terms of weight it has Normal and Bold options only, as I mentioned last week. If we require additional weight options such as light, medium, bold, or extra bold, we may need to consider exploring alternative fonts.

This is what it look like on my phone for the footer


Time: +25mins @ricaV2

Hi @jaime some minor tweaks:

1. Footer - Right hand side column - 
Spacing needs to match example
Text formatting (boldness) needs to match example

2. /products - compact laminate cut to size service - Needs to be removed. 

3 /product/bench-seating/ - remove "commercial" from title only

4. /product/privacy-core-partition/ - change page title + seo title to: "Full Height Privacy Core (PC)"

5. /product/privacy-ultra-partition/ - change page title + seo title to: "Full Height Privacy Ultra (PU)"

5. /projects/ - Subheading divider to be changed to dot

6. Architect login - this page doesn't appear correct?

7. Global colour check? #24408E ..

8. /contact-us/ - text styling doesn't match instructions - bolding of by appointment 

9. /contact-us/ - Text: Send us a message not correct colour, change to green specified. 


Questions for Belinda:
1. Footer - Please clarify comments about the 2 locations for each state. 
2. Resources tab to have it's own page - sure thing, we just need content.

Hi Chris,

Thank you for letting me know.

There must be a delay with our emails as your email just came through now.

Kind regards,
Belinda Henderson
Marketing Specialist
Tel: 1300 387 228
Address: 13 Pullman Place, Emu Plains NSW 2750

Hi Belinda, 

Thanks, confirming your amendments have been received. Our dev team have begun working through the changes and we loop back once complete.
@jaime are you free to tackle these as prio task?
@jaime are you free to tackle these as prio task?

Hi Chris,

Attached is the PDF with the latest amendments.

Ben has reviewed the amendments and said to begin the changes.

Please contact me if you require any clarification on the notes provided.

Please also let me know what is a realistic launch time.

Kind regards,
Belinda Henderson
Marketing Specialist
Tel: 1300 387 228
Address: 13 Pullman Place, Emu Plains NSW 2750

Hi Belinda, 

Totally fine, I am standing by. 

That is a great plan. The priority will of course be to ensure that Ben approves of all the updates. 

Yes, A Friday go-live is absolutely possible. Although we'd recommend a time earlier in the day to ensure we can test form submission etc.

Hi Chris,

Thank you for speaking with me earlier today.

It is time consuming writing the amendments and I hope to send them to you before lunchtime tomorrow.

We can then create a time for a Zoom meeting with Ben to discuss the amendments and a possible website launch time.

Would it be possible to go live on Friday afternoon?

Kind regards,
Belinda Henderson
Marketing Specialist
Tel: 1300 387 228
Address: 13 Pullman Place, Emu Plains NSW 2750

Hi Belinda, 

Understood, standing by.

Hi Chris,

Thank you for your email.

Do not change the colour of the icons, I think they give some interest in a different colour and we do have light blue in the logo.

I will send an email later this morning with the amendments required before we go live.

Kind regards,
Belinda Henderson
Marketing Specialist
Tel: 1300 387 228
Address: 13 Pullman Place, Emu Plains NSW 2750

Hi Belinda, 

Thanks for your call earlier and the update on the icons. If possible, let's tackle the colour of the icons as phase 2, our design team will recreate them for you. 

Confirming we have completed the changes discussed during yesterday's as well as uploading the documents to their respective locations. These will become visible upon go-live. 

Can you please review the staging website and let us know if there are any further changes?
Here is the link just in case: https://staging-duracube.kinsta.cloud/

Thanks and speak soon,
Logged 15mins to Harvest

Hi @chris updates completed

https://staging-duracube.kinsta.cloud/downloads/

Time: +15mins @ricaV2

@jaime can you please assist with the document PDF upload? 

Please add to the correct button on the following page:
Resources > Technical documents
https://staging-duracube.kinsta.cloud/downloads/

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Active
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body: Logged a total of 45mins to Harvest
@ricaV2 please add 15 mins of my time to yours and track. thanks!

Hi Chris,

Thank you very much for your time yesterday. I have spent 40 minutes trying to locate the icons and have not been able to find them yet. I will continue to look.

They are probably with the people who created the website initially.

Attached are the documents from the Downloads folder with the new logo. I have not changed the name of the document, just replaced the old logo with the new logo.

Please upload the attached documents to the Duracube staging site.

Kind regards,
Belinda Henderson
Marketing Specialist
Tel: 1300 387 228 Mb: 0401 298 893
Address: 13 Pullman Place, Emu Plains NSW 2750

Hi Belinda,

Thanks for your time yesterday. Our team are working through the updates discussed. 

In the meantime, can you please let me know if you have the AI/Illustrator files for the home page icons? (screenshot attached). 
If so, can you please email them over? This will allow us to carry out the colour changes in a shorter turnaround.
